description: The day the world got a lot more fun. Welcome, Nanu!

title: First Smile
description: That toothless grin that melted everyone's heart.

title: First Steps
description: Wobbly but determined! Nanu took his first steps today.

title: First Word
description: Said 'Amma' for the first time. Dad is still waiting for his turn ğŸ˜…

title: Started Talking Non-Stop
description: Once he started, he never stopped. Literally. Never. Stopped.

title: First Day of School
description: Big backpack, bigger smile. Nanu conquered school!

title: Turned 5!
description: Cake, candles, and a wish to become a 'car driver'. Dream big, kiddo!

title: Lost First Tooth
description: The tooth fairy visited! Nanu negotiated for extra payment. Smart kid.
